name: Legitimate Interest
description: Cadie Desbiens-Desmeules, (Toggle button) 2021. Technique: Javascript. “Legitimate Interest” is part of “I’m not a robot”, a series of applications exploring the murky world of digital labour and human intelligence tasks. Paying with our personal data and engaging in free labour has consequences: today, half of online platform workers earn less than $2 per hour. Meanwhile, the Big Four (Google, Amazon, Facebook and Apple) make trillions of dollars by harvesting human’s precious attention and intelligence. As the modern saying goes: “If something is free, ‘you’ are the product.” https://desbiens-desmeules.com/im-not-a-robot/
